name: Coney Island MCU Park Wi fi Cable Apt****
summary: This open loft cozy apartment w/ocean view is centrally located literally just a 3 minute walk to area amusement parks, area beaches and mass transit system. Visit the new Ford Amphitheater, IHOP, Chipolte, MCU Park, Luna Park Rides, the Scream Zone, Coney Island USA, the New York Aquarium, The Cylcone and Thunderbolt Roller Coaster, Coney Island Brewery, Foot Print, Totonnos Pizzeria (rated NYC best), Garguilo's Restaurant, Parkview Diner, Tom's Diner, Abe Stark Skating Rink, Matchpoint Spa.

name: 1 block away from the beach
summary: Perfect for anyone wanting to exeprience Coney Island up close. 1 block away from the beach. 5 min walk to all major attractions and 8 min walk subway station.

name: Suíte na Barra-Jeunesse
summary: Local seguro. Próximo ao Rio Centro, Arena Jeunesse, RockinRio, Parque Olímpico.

name: Clean, Convenient and Cosy
summary: Surround by local parks and shops. Public transports only 2 minute walk away.  31 minutes total travel time to the City or 10kms.

name: 2 Rooms Apt Max5 center of Mongkok
summary: Mongkok MTR station just 5 mins walk, quiet at night yet center of Mongkok, great for family stay, shoppings, thousands of local restaurants, famous tourist spots near by ladies market, Langham place. It locates between middle of Disney and Ocean Park. Notice:1 kid under 3 is free. From second kids count as adult in any age. All kids above 4 count as adult fee.

name: Algasol
summary: Proximité: Plage, commerces, piscine, sport, bar, restaurants, activité pour les enfants, marché tout les dimanches matin, entre autres...
